title: 84/35/EEC: Council Decision of 23 January 1984 on the provisional application to the State of St Christopher and Nevis of the arrangements provided for in Decision 80/1186/EEC on the association of the overseas countries and territories with the European Economic Community
header:
COUNCIL  DECISION
of 23 January 1984
on the provisional application to the State of St Christopher and Nevis of the arrangements provided for in Decision 80/1186/EEC on the association of the overseas countries and territories with the European Economic Community
(84/35/EEC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The arrangements laid down by Decision 80/1186/EEC shall apply provisionally to St Christopher and Nevis until the latter accedes to the Second ACP-EEC Convention.

Questions relating to the application to St Christopher and Nevis of Decision 80/1186/EEC shall be dealt with as necessary by direct contact between the competent authorities of that State and of the Community.

This Decision shall enter into force on the day of its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply with effect from 19 September 1983.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 23 January 1984.
For the Council
The President
C. CHEYSSON
